caption.p: SRH antibody responses obtained from different geographical regions in France. Overall and categories analysis of immune coverage for Normandy ( A), for Pays de la Loire ( B), for Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes ( C) and for Occitanie ( D). SRH titers below the clinical protection threshold (>85 mm 2) are in red colors, titers above the clinical protection threshold are in light blue (85 mm 2 and >154 mm 2), titers above the clinical and virus shedding protection threshold (154 mm 2 and above) are in blue. (✻) p-value ≤ 0.0001.
